title: Embroidered Picture, 1801–25
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery with painted paper and wool appliqué on wool foundation
Technique: embroidered in running, satin and speckling stitches and appliqué on a fulled plain weave foundation
dimensions: Frame H x W x D: 43.8 x 40 cm (17 1/4 x 15 3/4 in.)
description: Oval picture of a girl playing a pipe seated at the foot of a tree with a goat at her feet, in several colors. Glazed and mounted in a rectangular frame with a wooden mat.

tombstone.epitaph:
Embroidered Picture, 1801–25.
1801–25. Medium: silk embroidery with painted paper and wool appliqué on wool foundation
Technique: embroidered in running, satin and speckling stitches and appliqué on a fulled plain weave foundation. Gift of Mrs. H.P. Davison. 1974-72-1.
